page.title: 06Visitors to Stanway House
page.content: A survey was conducted in June of visitors to{Stanway House}taking a sample of 100 people .We found that 8 were local (ie. lived within a 20 mile radius); 13 were other day visitors who came from as far as 80 miles away; 79 were holiday visitors who were staying in the the locality on holiday.{Broadway}was the most popular choice for local accommodation. 24 of the visitors were foreign with U.S.A. providing a quarter of this number. Most of the visitors gave an interest in historic buildings as their reason for visiting, although a number said they just happened to be passing. In describing the area words like, beautiful, interesting, peaceful, unspoilt, picturesque, and friendly were used. Only one person interviewed did not like the area.
